definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

pinyin: Yuan2 zi3 Ke1 xue2 jia1 Tong1 bao4

sentences.english: The result of occupational disease checkup should be announced to trade union.
sentences.chinese: 並及時向工會通報職業病檢查情況。

sentences.english: We set up a notification and inspection system to improve budget implementation.
sentences.chinese: 建立通報和督查制度，加強預算執行。
將及時向你通報情況。對嗎？

sentences.english: Telling an adult is not snitching.
In communicating the level of alarm, authorities need to be able to move down as well as up.
sentences.chinese: 在通報警戒級別時，各方當局需能做出上下調整。

sentences.english: Musole's findings were shared with various Zambian government ministries.
sentences.chinese: 穆索萊將調查結果向贊比亞有關各部做了通報。

sentences.english: The development of the review has informed the Alliance`s strategy in this area. The Alliance HPSR is now initiating two new capacity development initiatives, namely
sentences.chinese: 這一文件的出臺通報了聯盟在這一領域的戰略。

sentences.english: Arrived the yard of south song, immediately somebody works in a notice.
sentences.chinese: 到了南歌的院子，立刻有人進去通報。

sentences.english: Hu and Choummaly briefed each other on their respective domestic situations.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤與朱馬利相互通報了各自國內情況。

sentences.english: The notification document can be obtained from the EC Enquiry Point.
sentences.chinese: 通報文件可從歐共體諮詢點獲取。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia tipped off U.S. intelligence about the parcels.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯向美國情報部門通報了包裹的可疑之處。

sentences.english: And immediate were informed of his Lafayette connection.
sentences.chinese: 並立即通報了他的拉法耶特的連接。

sentences.english: The median degree of consensus among NFPs on notification decisions was 78%.
sentences.chinese: 國家中心就通報決定達成一致意見的中位數爲78%。
僕人唱名通報史密斯先生來訪。

sentences.english: No legal obligation to disclose that B of A wanted to adjust the purchase price?
sentences.chinese: 沒有法律義務通報說美國銀行想要調整買價？

sentences.english: I figured he'd called my mother, but he didn't give a report.
sentences.chinese: 我猜想，他是給母親打電話，但是他沒有通報情況。

definition: to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to report a case to the authorities
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
